system.description:
See @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX]{Magic} for full details on divine magic.

Holy symbol: A paladin must carry a holy symbol (see the equipment list).

Deity disfavour: Paladins must be faithful to the tenets of their alignment and religion. Paladins who fall from favour with their deity may incur penalties.

Spell casting: From 9th level, a paladin may pray to receive spells. The power and number of spells available to a paladin are determined by the characterâ€™s experience level. The list of spells available to paladins is found in @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX.JournalEntryPage.iW0YUQNIRaYo5ecH]{Cleric} and @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX.JournalEntryPage.5bcXC9ougUPEBFoY]{Magic-User} spells (paladins have the same spell selection as clerics)
